description.para: The timestamp when this container was initially created/generated.
When the container was read from a zip file (using xtlcon:zip-to-container), this attribute holds the href of this zip file.
Holds the name of the zip file for writing the container to (using xtlcon:container-to-zip).
After the container is written to a zip file using xtlcon:container-to-zip, this attribute will hold the full canonical filename of the zip file.

After the container is written to a zip file using xtlcon:container-to-zip, this attribute will hold the full canonical name of the temporary directory used for this process (probably not very useful).
When the container was read from a directory (using xtlcon:directory-to-container), this attribute holds the href of this directory.
Holds the name of the directory for writing the container to (using xtlcon:container-to-disk).
After the container is written to a directory file using xtlcon:container-to-disk, this attribute will hold the full canonical name of the directory.
Any other attributes are allowed, so additional information can be added for use during processing.
A document inside the container structure.
An external document, referenced from the container structure.
Any other elements are allowed, so additional information can be added for use during processing.
